page.title: 17TWO PUBLIC HOUSES
page.content: There are two pubs in the village the Star and the Brewer Tap whcih is just over the road from the Brewery. The Star is three or four hundred years old.As well as selling many kinds of beers, spirits and soft drinks they also serve meals and snacks eg salads, sandwiches, sweets and crisps.They also have an off license so that people can buy drinks there to take off the premises. The bar is all one room although there is a little place that has been sectioned off as a little restraurant.At the other end of the room is a huge fireplace where there is always a log fire burning in winter.There is also a dart board and a fruit machine. Most of the customers are local but sometimes people passing by go in.
